Section-2.p:
Java SDK version 1.3 or higher
You need a Java compiler to build JDBC driver.

Apache Ant
Ant is a Java-based build tool that is used to build JDBC driver. build.xml contains build instruction for Ant to build JDBC driver.

ol.li: Unpack JDBC driver source files and build.xml to an empty folder (let's it is c:\602sql-jdbc).
Run command-line prompt (console) that is enabled to use Java compiler from Java SDK and to run Ant.

li.p:
Compile JDBC driver with commands
C: cd \602sql-jdbc ant
JDBC driver will be compiled into C:\602sql-jdbc\602sql11-jdbc.jar file.
